summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1215, for the improvement of Massachusetts Street, from Railroad Avenue to the East Water Way, all in the City of Seattle, by laying a water main therein, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 13312, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
